name: sompo-hasar-operasyon
description: Hasar Yönetim Sistemi - Arabuluculuk ve Hasar Dosya Yönetimi
productName: SOMPO Harici Avukat ve Arabulucu Uygulaması
author: Yunus Emre Şenoğlu <47872150+yemresenoglu@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.build:beta: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path .env) { Copy-Item .env .env.backup -Force }; Copy-Item .env.beta .env -Force; quasar build; if (Test-Path .env.backup) { Copy-Item .env.backup .env -Force; Remove-Item .env.backup -Force } else { if (Test-Path .env.development) { Copy-Item .env.development .env -Force } }"
scripts.build:preprod: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path .env) { Copy-Item .env .env.backup -Force }; Copy-Item .env.preprod .env -Force; quasar build; if (Test-Path .env.backup) { Copy-Item .env.backup .env -Force; Remove-Item .env.backup -Force } else { if (Test-Path .env.development) { Copy-Item .env.development .env -Force } }"
scripts.build:prod: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path .env) { Copy-Item .env .env.backup -Force }; Copy-Item .env.production .env -Force; quasar build; if (Test-Path .env.backup) { Copy-Item .env.backup .env -Force; Remove-Item .env.backup -Force } else { if (Test-Path .env.development) { Copy-Item .env.development .env -Force } }"
scripts.clean: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path dist) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist }; if (Test-Path .quasar) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .quasar }; if (Test-Path node_modules\.cache) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules\.cache }"
scripts.clean:all: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path dist) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist }; if (Test-Path .quasar) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .quasar }; if (Test-Path node_modules) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules }; if (Test-Path package-lock.json) { Remove-Item -Force package-lock.json }"
